https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/80pCW5rOAO4FZaX78rmT5ufaCh3.jpg In the near future Japan's economy is in shambles and bet bowling is huge. Team Kingpin hopes the government will ban bet bowling so they can open a casino. The team full of beautiful girls, team allways, engages in a fierce battle to stop them.
